description: A student at Tasuke`s school. She is one year behind Tasuke at the school which they attend. She is jealous of Shaorin and Ruuan and feels they are rivals to win Tasuke`s heart. She first meets Tasuke in the anime after she wishes to Kami (God) that she will meet the man of her dreams and she falls immediately in love with Tasuke when he saves her from tripping over. In the manga early in her first term at the school, on a rainy day, Tasuke sees that she doesn`t have an umbrella and lends her his, forgetting for the moment that Shaorin and Ruuan aren`t at the school that day and can`t replace his umbrella. She develops a big crush on Tasuke and it keeps getting enlarged by inadvertent accidents.
name: Aihara Kaori
